description:
Themes - Widget & Wallpapers - the leading fast and professional themes app of 2024 that elevates the visual appeal of your phone with its vast collection of icon changer, top widgets, and aesthetic wallpapers.

Change your home screen with one of our many aesthetic wallpapers, make your home screen look cool with our cool wallpapers and change the look of your phone with themes our favorite topic! Fully customize your phone with our fancy themes app.

Get ready to transform your home screen into a personalized masterpiece with these exciting features:

Stay on top of the latest trends as Themes - Widget & Wallpapers updates regularly, ensuring you have access to fresh and trendy themes to keep your phone's appearance up to date. Themes updates allows you to personalize your home screen with a variety of features and styles ranging from Cute themes, Anime themes, KPOP themes to seasonal themes like Christmas and Halloween and match with every iOS device. Express your unique style and create a visually stunning interface that suits your preferences.

【Many exquisite widgets】

One of the standout features of Themes - Widget & Wallpapers app is its extensive collection of top widgets. Users can choose from a variety of widget styles, sizes, and designs to create a unique and functional home screen. Whether it's displaying the weather or quick access to favorite apps, the widget customization options are diverse and cater to individual preferences.

【HD wallpaper changer】

Themes - Widget & Wallpapers gives you 4K & Full HD wallpaper backgrounds to change wallpaper. And the 4K HD photos are updated daily!

【Diverse icons changer】

Customize your homescreen even further with a wide range of icon changers. From fresh and modern styles to cute, lovely, and fun designs, you'll find the perfect icons to complement your home screen and give it a unique touch. Help you change & customize icons and names for any apps. The new icons can be chosen from gallery, other app icons and lots of personalized icon changer. Our app will create a shortcut to the new icon on your home screen. This is the easiest way to decorate your phone.

【Personalize your own themes, widgets & wallpapers】

The app goes beyond top widgets and HD wallpapers with its theme packs. These pre-designed packs include a cohesive set of wallpapers, icons, and widgets that work together to create a unified and visually pleasing look. Users can choose from a variety of theme packs or mix and match different widgets, app icons to create their own unique themes.

【Easy One-Click Replacement】

Save time and energy with the app's convenient one-click replacement feature. Simply choose your preferred icon changer, themes, widgets, and wallpapers, and with a one click, transform your device's appearance to match your desired aesthetic.

An indispensable application for those who like aesthetics
▪ Exquisite app icons!
▪ Super fast update speed!
▪ Diverse themes, app icons!
▪ Personalization just for you!
▪ Easy one-click replacement!
▪ Easy access & Custom widget, app icons give you special interface (UI)

What if your Lock screen, Home screen, and even Control Center could reflect your personality, style, and mood — every single day?

That’s exactly what Wallpapers, Widget & Theme App delivers. Designed for users who want more than just a background image, this app gives you full creative control over how your phone looks and feels. Whether you’re into cute, minimal, bold, or aesthetic styles, this app has everything you need to create a screen setup that feels like you.

WALLPAPERS, WIDGET & THEME APP – MAIN FEATURES

- Aesthetic Wallpapers for Every Style
Choose from a constantly updated collection of high-quality wallpapers. Every style, every mood — whether it’s soft pastels, dark abstracts, or seasonal designs.

- Create Unique Wallpapers with AI
Just type in an idea, a vibe, or a color scheme — our AI turns your words into a unique wallpaper you won’t find anywhere else.

- Custom Widgets for Home & Lock Screen
Build your own widgets for clock, battery, quotes, countdowns, and more. Perfectly match them to your wallpaper with styles that blend beautifully.

- Curated Themes with Matching Design
No more mismatched screens. Apply curated themes that include wallpapers and widgets, designed to work perfectly together.

- Custom Control Center
Redesign your iPhone's Control Center to match your style. Change background color, layout feel, and add new aesthetics.

- Tutorial Setting – Easy Setup for New Users
First time customizing? No worries. Our tutorial setting walks you through every feature — simple, clear, and visual. You’ll get your dream screen setup in minutes.

HOW TO USE

- Open the app and explore Wallpapers, Widgets, or Themes.
- Tap “Preview” to see how elements look together.
- Apply your chosen style to your home or lock screen.
- Use the AI tool to generate custom wallpapers.
- Follow the step-by-step tutorial to learn all features.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase.
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase.
- Subscriptions will renew automatically unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- When the subscription is canceled, it will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded.
- If offered, any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.

DISCLAIMER
This app is not affiliated with any of the brands or platforms mentioned. All trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

Transform your iPhone into a personal masterpiece with Wallpics, the ultimate destination for stunning live wallpapers, DIY wallpaper creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper sets, and true 4K quality backgrounds. Whether you’re looking to refresh your lockscreen or craft a cohesive home-and-lockscreen theme, Wallpics delivers everything you need to make your device truly yours.

Endless Live Wallpapers & 4K Quality Backgrounds
• Dive into a vast library of dynamic live wallpapers in breathtaking 4K quality—fluid animations that bring motion and depth to your lockscreen and home screen.
• Browse categories from abstract art and nature scenes to futuristic cityscapes, all rendered in ultra-high definition for crisp, vibrant visuals.
• Enjoy smooth playback and perfect compatibility with iOS’s Live Photo lockscreen feature—your screen has never looked this alive.

DIY Wallpaper Studio
• Unleash your creativity with Wallpics’s intuitive wallpaper maker. Mix and match patterns, colors, and textures to design your own custom backgrounds in minutes.
• Add text, overlays, and stickers—or start with our premium templates to craft a signature look.
• Export your creations in both standard and 4K resolutions, ready to set as your lockscreen, home screen, or share with friends.

Charging Animations & Dynamic Effects
• Impress every time you plug in: choose from a gallery of charging animations that light up around your battery icon—so fun, you’ll look forward to low battery!
• From neon pulses and sparkles to liquid fills and energy ripples, our power-on effects are fully customizable and optimized for iOS.

Premium PFP Icons & Matching Wallpaper Sets
• Personalize your social profiles with a curated collection of pfp icons—stylized avatars, minimalist logos, and neon glyphs that pop on any background.
• Coordinate your entire device aesthetic with matching wallpaper bundles—lockscreen and home screen designs that complement each other perfectly.
• Keep your theme cohesive across apps by exporting both backgrounds and pfp icons at once.

Features at a Glance

Live Wallpapers: Animated lockscreen backgrounds & home screen motion

DIY Wallpaper: Custom background studio with templates, text & stickers

Charging Animations: Dynamic power-on effects for every charge

PFP Icons: Profile picture avatars in multiple styles and resolutions

Matching Wallpaper Sets: Coordinated lockscreen + home screen bundles

4K Quality: Ultra-HD backgrounds and exports

Ready to elevate your iPhone experience? Download Wallpics now and unlock a universe of live wallpapers, DIY creations, charging animations, pfp icons, matching wallpaper, and 4K quality backgrounds—tailored just for you!

Icon Changer frees you from the boring home screen by installing new theme kits which will gives your phone a new look. Its editor is loaded with different color combinations and ultimate icons which will gives you icon combination.

FEATURES:
- Library of icons which you can use for customize your icon

- Flat Colors for the icons background

- Gradient color sets provided right in the app

- Pre-made icon theme kits included

- Gradient icon pack- Colored Icons kit

- Dark Cat icon pack

- Golden icon pack

- Pink Glitter Icon Pack

HealthKit
If you choose to set the health widgets,  HealthKit allows apps like IconChanger to collect and display health and fitness data from a user's iPhone or Apple Watch. A step widget is a type of widget that displays a user's daily step count. The step widget provides a quick and easy way for users to track their physical activity throughout the day.



How To Use ?
